Flip a NRRD image along one axis

Source: R/UNUImageProcessingFunctions.R
NrrdFlip.Rd

Flip a NRRD image along one axis

NrrdFlip(infile, outfile, axes, suffix = NULL, endian = c("big", "little"),
  CreateDirs = TRUE, Verbose = TRUE, UseLock = FALSE,
  OverWrite = c("no", "update", "yes"))

Arguments

infile

Input/output files
outfile

Input/output files
axes

Which axes to flip (0-indexed integer)
suffix

Suffix to add to input file to construct output file.
endian

Whether output image should be big (default) or little endian for multibyte data types (essentially all other than 8 bit)
CreateDirs

Whether to create implied output directories
Verbose

Print status messages
UseLock

Whether to use file-based locking to enable simple parallelisation
OverWrite

Whether to overwrite (yes or no) or update output image.

Value

TRUE if output exists

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
